From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Ironhide disconects from his trailer section, currently holding the hurt
Cybrat. He then transformed, and shook the larger robots hand. "Best of
luck, and may Primus watch over you, but you will not be that far from
us. With your advanced ship, you can easily contact us." he said in a
more joyful tone. 

"Blah, silly wasted emotion, love." snorted a gruff voice, as the huge
Dinobot Grimlock broke up the handshake, and looked down at both of
them. "These Autobos weak enough Ironhide. No need to wipe their noses
every chance you get." He said accusingly.
